slow.title: Please Wait
slow.text: Please be patient, this game will take some time to load.

slowandbuggy.title: Please Wait
slowandbuggy.text: Please be patient, this game is often slow and buggy at the start, But it will work fine after a moment or two.

twoimage.title: Choose What Version
twoimage.text: Duck life treasurehunt has two different versions, the older flash version which is probably the one that you remember and the newer HTML5 version which is a bit different but is more reliable.
